Package de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul

Class Player

java.lang.Object
de.dhbw.ravensburg.zuul.Player
public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
It holds variables and methods for the main protagonist of the game.
Version:
08.05.2020
Author:
Frederik Dammeier - Philipp Schneider

  • Constructor Details

    • Player

      public Player​(java.lang.String name, float inventorySize, int maxLife)
      Creates a new object of type Player
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the player. Doesn't have a function yet.
      inventorySize - The maximum weight the Player can carry. Gets determined by the games difficulty.

  • Method Details

    • eat

      public void eat​(int amount)
      Increases or diminishes the players hunger count. He has a max hunger of 100.
      Parameters:
      amount - Positive number: player eats; Negative number: player gets increasingly hungry.

    • setDamage

      public void setDamage​(int amount)
      Parameters:
      amount - that damage increases/decreases.

    • takeDamage

      public void takeDamage​(int amount)
      Gives damage to the player by decreasing his health count.
      Parameters:
      amount -

    • regenerate

      public void regenerate​(int amount)
      Regenerates the players health by increasing his health count.
      Parameters:
      amount -

    • getName

      public java.lang.String getName()
      Returns:
      Name of the player.

    • getHunger

      public int getHunger()
      Returns:
      Amount of hunger points left

    • getHealth

      public int getHealth()
      Returns:
      Amount of health points left

    • getInventory

      public Inventory getInventory()
      Returns:

    • getDamage

      public int getDamage()
      Returns:
      Current damage that is transfered.
